body: The stuff in Tensor.h predates native functions, which is why they are not listed. New stuff should be native functions.  Before we move _everything_ over, we also need to make the native function declaration more concise and make sure the non-dynamic paths (that just drop the method into Tensor.h, for instance) works. @gchanan let me know if you want to chat about how to build out the native function interface.
